snippet: Mike Cammalleri and Jacob Josefson scored in a shootout on Saturday, and the Devils won for the sixth time in seven games, beating the visiting Islanders, 3-2.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New Jersey Devils defeat New York Islanders, 3-2, in shootout; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Mike Cammalleri and Jacob Josefson scored in a shootout on Saturday, and the Devils won for the sixth time in seven games, beating the visiting Islanders, 3-2.

headline.print_headline: Devils Defeat the Islanders in a Shootout
headline.main: Devils Defeat the Islanders in a Shootout
